newsitem.title: USA: Progenitor says names Mark Bagnall CFO.
newsitem.headline: Progenitor says names Mark Bagnall CFO.

text.p: Progenitor Inc, a majority-owned subsidiary of Interneuron Pharmaceuticals Inc, said on Wednesday it has named Mark Bagnall chief financial officer and vice president.
Bagnall was most recently vice president-finance and chief financial officer at Somatix Therapy Corp, the company said.
A spokesman for Progenitor said Bagnall is the subsidiary's first full-time CFO, hired in preparation for Progenitor's life as a publicly-traded company.
He said that Progenitor would go ahead with its planned initial public offering of 2.5 million shares "as soon as the conditions are receptive."
Late last week, Progenitor had said it was postponing its IPO, filed in June, because of adverse market conditions.
